column4: using mencoder what options would i use to conver test.mov to test.avi please could someone help me. Everytime i do it i get an empty avi file.
I would use "mencoder -ovc xvid -oac mp3lame -xvidencopts bitrate=128 -lameopts br=64 -o output.avi test.mov" (maybe "-lameopts b=64")
Obviously you change the bitrates
-- thanx
That gives an AVI using the Xvid codec, and MP3 for sound. Make sure you have those codecs available in your media player
